title: Smart Data Models - Ucifi / Edge computing script
description: The uCIFI edge computing scripts object defines a particular script to be executed by a device under a time or any other condition set by a "Edge Computing Time Condition" or "Edge Computing Generic Condition" object.. objectID:'3437'. objectURN:'urn:oma:lwm2m:ext:3437'. lwm2mVersion:'1.0'. objectVersion:'1.0'. multipleInstances:'Multiple'. mandatory:'Optional'.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `Edge computing script`.

Name.description: Property. Name of the script.. resourceID:'1'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Signature.description: Property. Unique hash or signature associated to the script to be verified by the end-device before execution. The format of the hash or signature is vendor-specific.. resourceID:'2'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Version.description: Property. Version of the script, as defined by the vendor.. resourceID:'3'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Script.description: Property. Vendor-specific script.. resourceID:'4'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.

Script format.description: Property. Script format to enable the device to select the script interpreter in case it supports multiple (e.g. LUA). The format of this resource is free to support vendor-specific formats.. resourceID:'5'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Non supported script.description: Property. Set to True if the script is not supported or if the device has identified errors in the script.. resourceID:'6'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Non authorized script.description: Property. Set to True if the hash/signature is not correct.. resourceID:'7'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.
